channel.title: How to start server and continue with it?
channel.description: I want to start a new server but i dont know really how, I see ppl using like commands and texts with codes but i dont know how to use it, Could som1 explain ohw to start?

start by downloading a server, and try to find tutorials that would be kool 4 ur server, and follow them, when i did it i just naturally started to learn how to code

I see ppl using like commands and texts with codes but i dont know how to use it,
Could som1 explain ohw to start?
